snippet: Mike Carp’s pinch-hit grand slam in the 10th lifted the A.L. East-leading Red Sox over the Rays, whose nosedive continues.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Boston Red Sox defeat Tampa Bay Rays, 7-3; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Mike Carp’s pinch-hit grand slam in the 10th lifted the A.L. East-leading Red Sox over the Rays, whose nosedive continues.

headline.main: Red Sox’ Slam Adds to Rays’ Swoon
headline.print_headline: Red Sox’ Slam Adds to Rays’ Swoon
